ygData.subject: Bugs n' Exploits (was:RE: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqba rds] Proposal to chang e how ...))
ygData.msgSnippet: One GM s tactic is another GM s exploit. If nothing else, I d /petition and /bug EVERY time before starting the hunt there.  At least that way, you re
ygData.messageBody:
One GM's tactic is another GM's exploit.

If nothing else, I'd /petition and /bug EVERY time before starting the hunt
there. At least that way, you're (somewhat) covered.

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 9:33 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqbards] Proposal to
chang e how ...)


In reference to the fear kite tacticts in OT near the skyfire zone -- move
to the corner between skyfire and frontier mountains. If you fear mobs
there, they run up into the corner and run back and forth mostly up in the
corner.

I had a gm watch me for about 15 minutes up there one evening. I asked him
if he considered it an exploit, and he said "Nope, Great tactics!" Bear in
mind that the mob was never just running into a wall, it was always in
motion, and as long as fear wasnt resisted it stayed on this little path
where it ran back and forth.

Lago


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
